title: Game-Based Civic Awareness and Poverty Eradication Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners access simulations and VR content via personal devices, developing social problem-solving competencies through collaborative learning. The course operates primarily on formative assessments with continuous feedback

learning_goals: Learners analyze poverty-generating structures using game mechanics and propose three or more realistic solutions.
Learners perform team-based decision-making in simulations and evaluate the social impact of civic engagement with over 80% accuracy.
Learners identify daily challenges faced by developing-world residents through VR experiences and design scientific approaches to address them three or more times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
